docreader.range.paragraph.characterRun

Class FieldReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • docreader.range.paragraph.characterRun.FieldReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericReader<FieldStore<?>>

    public class FieldReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements GenericReader<FieldStore<?>>
    Finds field data in a given character run
    Author:
    Moritz Dorka

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public FieldStore<?> read()
        Getter for the extracted FieldStore
        Specified by:
        read in interface GenericReader<FieldStore<?>>
        Returns:
        extracted FieldStore or null if no FieldStore was found
        See Also:
        GenericReader.read()

      • getCharacterRunAfterField

        public int getCharacterRunAfterField(int startRun)
        Get the first characterRun which starts behind this field

        Note: characterRuns are not guaranteed to end at field boundaries.

        Parameters:
        startRun - Last character run before the field (only used to optimize the search)
        Returns:
        number of the first character run after the field
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the argument is malformed
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if no field data is available

      • processField

        private void processField()
